value.string_value: Does the US withdrawal from Afghanistan signal decline of its hegemony?

legacy.description: Read China, daily on your smartphone.
legacy.name: China Daily app

legacy.full_text:
The US hegemony is based on 4 pillars: ability to steer global situation, credibility in global affairs, effective execution and soft power of leading by example. But its recent debacle in #Afghanistan shows to the world that all these pillars are falling.
https://t.co/QWmHYBhGo1

legacy.description: China Daily-powered think tank, connecting China-focused thinkers around the world, providing thought-provoking research on China-related issues
legacy.name: China Watch Institute

legacy.full_text:
As a crackdown on terrorism, the US invasion in #Afghanistan 20 years ago had some sense of legitimacy. But with a hasty, disgraceful, ill-planned withdrawal of troops, the US has broken its promises to the Afghan people and abandoned its allies.
https://t.co/T9Frh8cBEr

legacy.description: China Daily-powered think tank, connecting China-focused thinkers around the world, providing thought-provoking research on China-related issues
legacy.name: China Watch Institute

legacy.full_text:
3 issues must be handled to avoid worst-case scenarios in #Afghanistan: ensuring the Afghan people's right to survival and development, preventing regional turbulence having spillover effects, and building a new international mechanism.
https://t.co/T9Frh8cBEr https://t.co/BLwejY5CiG

value.string_value: Think tanks in China and Russia should maintain close relations and deepen their cooperation to face common challenges and bring mutual development, experts from both countries said on Thursday.
Think tanks urged to help boost China-Russia ties

legacy.description: Read China, daily on your smartphone.
legacy.name: China Daily app

legacy.full_text:
Think tanks from #China and #Russia should keep close relations and deepen cooperation to face common challenges and bring mutual development, said experts from both sides at a seminar on June 24, before the video talk of the two heads of state on June 28.
https://t.co/RPHfmFfJgz

legacy.description: China Daily-powered think tank, connecting China-focused thinkers around the world, providing thought-provoking research on China-related issues
legacy.name: China Watch Institute

legacy.full_text:
The world of macroeconomics and geopolitics is changing with international rules weakened, but the strong China-Russia friendship reflects mutual respect and adherence to the principle of peaceful coexistence, said scholars from both sides at the seminar.
https://t.co/RPHfmFfJgz https://t.co/UAHMDLXYHJ

legacy.full_text:
The "Russia-Eurasia Studies" Report Series, consisting of 6 reports, was unveiled at the June 24 seminar, to inject the power of thoughts in boosting high-quality Sino-Russian relations, enhancing discourse power, and ensuring global peace and development.
https://t.co/qzPrbvlm1d https://t.co/sVAHRkLLGV
